title: John Penfold – Focused Photograpic
text:
I’d love to hear from you, whether you’re buying, selling or just want some guidance.
Phone: 07917 116974
Email: focusedphotographic@hotmail.com
E-bay: my e-bay page



I’ve run Focused Photographic since 2004, after starting in the camera business in 1990.
Why ‘Focused’? Because I care about giving great customer service and I specialise in Hasselblad and Nikon.
You’re always welcome to come and find me in Leeds. Otherwise, I usually attend the main camera fairs (such as Photographica, Wolverhampton, Frome and Boston Spa).
